name: Spaghetti Bolognese
process: Cook spaghetti. In a separate pan, cook ground beef with onions and garlic. Add tomato sauce and simmer. Serve sauce over spaghetti.

name: Sushi
process: Prepare sushi rice. Place nori on a bamboo mat. Spread rice on nori and add fish and vegetables. Roll and cut into pieces.

name: Tacos
process: Cook ground beef. Warm tortillas. Fill tortillas with beef, cheese, lettuce, tomato, and sour cream.

name: Butter Chicken
process: Cook chicken with spices. Add tomato sauce and butter. Simmer. Add cream and serve with rice or naan.

name: Caesar Salad
process: Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing. Add croutons and Parmesan cheese.

name: Apple Pie
process: Prepare pie crust. Fill with sliced apples, sugar, and cinnamon. Cover with top crust. Bake until golden brown.

name: Paella
process: Cook chicken and seafood. Add rice and saffron. Simmer with vegetables until rice is cooked.

name: Falafel
process: Blend chickpeas with garlic, onion, and spices. Form into balls and fry. Serve with pita and salad.
